TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Italic extends System.Windows.Documents.Span
.class public auto ansi Italic extends System.Windows.Documents.Span

Docs.summary: Provides an inline-level flow content element that causes content to render with an italic font style.

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Italic> enforces a strong content model for child content. See [TextElement Content Model Overview](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/textelement-content-model-overview) for more information about the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Italic> content model.
This is the equivalent of a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Span> with a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument.FontStyle%2A> value of <xref:System.Windows.FontStyles.Italic%2A> and the two elements can be used interchangeably.
